column1: Fakfak Torea Airport (Indonesian: Bandar Udara Torea Fakfak) (IATA: FKQ
column3: also known as Fak Fak Airport
column5: located in the province of West Papua in Indonesia. The airport resides at an elevation of 462 feet (141 m) above mean sea level. It has one runway designated 10/28 with an asphalt surface measuring 1
column7: 415 ft Ã— 66 ft). Currently Express Air and Wings Air offer commercial flights from this Airport. Among the most popular routes from this Airport are Sorong and Ambon. Address: Dulan Pok Pok Fakfak Sub-District Fakfak Regency West Papua 98611 Indonesia
